programme.title: Preview for "Nature's Abstracts"
programme.desc: This is a preview for the 2 hour moving art film "Natures Abstracts". Immerse yourself in the wondrous abstract patterns found in nature through the fine art photography of Elizabeth Carmel. Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for Rainforest Relaxation
programme.desc: Relax in the soothing greens of the rainforest in our newest release "Rainforest Relaxation". Clear creeks flow amongst the ancient ferns, and moss covered trees create intriguing forms and texture in this 45 minute nature film featuring the beauty of the Hoh rainforest in Olympic National Park. Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv on November 13, 2021.

programme.title: Fjords & Waterfalls of Norway
programme.desc: Experience the awe inspiring waterfalls and fjords of Norway in this 90 minute relaxing nature film. Soar down plummeting waterfalls and over the dramatic cliffs that plunge into the blue waters of remote fjords. Glimpse historic fishing villages accessible only by boat and relax to the calming soundtrack that accompanies the inspiring scenery.

programme.title: Slo Mo Snow
programme.desc: Experience the wondrous snow storms that blanketed Californias Sierra Mountains in January of 2023 in NatureStream.tvs newest release: "Slo Mo Snow". Filming was done at very slow motion to create an immersive experience of winters beauty. Aerial footage reveals the vast mountain landscape cloaked in snowy splendor. Run time 90 minutes. Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv

programme.title: You Are a King Les Brown Inspirational Speeches
programme.desc: Considered to be one of the best speakers in the world, Les Brown struggled his way to the top. He will inspire you to hustle hard, stay hungry, and always believe in the power of now.

programme.title: Top EPIC MOTIVATIONAL Speeches Vol. 1
programme.desc: Here is Goalcasts collection of the top motivational speeches to get you pumped.

programme.title: The Fundamental Truth About Love
programme.desc: Adam Reid Shares Expert Advice on a Fundamental Truth About Love. This Speech about the true source of love will change how you approach relationships forever!

programme.title: The Trap of Arrogance
programme.desc: A spoiled girl thinks she can use her rich dad to get ahead in life. From disrespecting the “janitor” to trying to bribe her way into getting a job, her arrogance knows no boundaries. When she gets exposed during a job interview, she receives a massive reality check on the importance of hard work and integrity.

programme.title: A Life Lesson
programme.desc: When caught bullying and suspended by her teacher, this mean girl tries to play innocent in front of her father. But as the saying goes, truth can’t be hidden for long.

programme.title: Unsafe Space
programme.desc: An evil dad mistreats his foster kid every chance he gets, but pretends to be a loving parent in front of his wife. Until one day, she catches him in his web of lies. Adopting a foster child is a huge responsibility. Will she do what’s right?

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown.
programme.desc: S1:E1 Rihanna found herself the victim of assault, from her best friend and then-boyfriend, Chris Brown. Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: Naomi Campbell Nelson Mandella Defending A Model
programme.desc: Supermodel Naomi Campbell was one of the most in-demand models of her time, but when the violent side of Naomi came out, she faced 7 years in prison! Then... Nelson Mandela stepped in to teach her a powerful lesson. Why did Nelson Mandela defend the world’s most controversial model?

programme.title: Avoiding Financial Emergencies with HSA s

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Youthful China

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: DOCUMENTAL

programme.title: ASÍ ES CHINA
programme.desc: Descubre para el televidente el gran legado cultural e histórico de las distintas regiones y etnias de China. También le acerca a la vida y las costumbres de la gente común y le muestra la evolución del país en aspectos como educación, sociedad y protección del medio ambiente y del patrimonio histórico y natural.

programme.title: CGTN NOTICIAS
programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: SABOREANDO CHINA
programme.desc: Aprenda a preparar las recetas más populares de China. Nuestro chef le revelará de forma práctica los secretos del arte culinario de esta nación asiática. Conozca los ingredientes más utilizados en la variada cocina regional, los orígenes de los platos e incluso sus beneficios para la salud. En De China a tu cocina, el espectador podrá experimentar a la vez la riqueza tradicional y la variedad gastronómica de China.

programme.title: NIHAO CHINA
programme.desc: Es la clase de chino de CGTN-Español. Las series “Aprendamos juntos pinyin”, “Comunícate en chino” y “Viajando y aprendiendo chino”, abordan diferentes niveles de aprendizaje de la nueva lengua de moda en el mundo, brindando así a los televidentes la posibilidad de ampliar su vocabulario, mejorar su gramática y dominar las frases y expresiones más usuales del idioma con más hablantes en el planeta.

programme.title: RONDA ARTÍSTICA
programme.desc: Se exhibe la diversidad de cantos y danzas, óperas locales tradicionales, música y artes folklóricas de China.

programme.title: HORA INFANTIL
programme.desc: Una selección de las mejores series chinas de dibujos animados, dobladas al español. Hora Infantil es una ventana a través de la cual los niños y adolescentes de los países de habla hispana pueden llegar a comprender mejor qué es y cómo es China.

programme.title: MIRADA ECONÓMICA

programme.title: Memecoins on Bitcoin!
programme.desc: What if trading Bitcoin memecoins was as easy as logging in with your wallet and clicking “go”? This week, we’re pleased to welcome Bob Bodily, CEO of Toniq Labs, to discuss the platform that’s turning that vision into reality. No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.title: Welcome to AI for Everyone: No Tech Skills Needed
programme.desc: Welcome to the very first episode of AI for Everyone Show! If you’ve ever been curious about artificial intelligence but felt overwhelmed by all the jargon and hype — this podcast is for you.

programme.title: Why I Stopped Googling: How AI Replaces Search Engines
programme.desc: We’ve all been there: You Google something simple… and end up lost in a maze of ads, popups, sponsored content, and outdated blog posts. What should have taken 30 seconds turns into a 10-minute scavenger hunt. In this episode, I share why I’ve all but stopped using search engines — and how artificial intelligence, specifically tools like ChatGPT, have become my go-to for finding fast, accurate, and personalized answers. This isn’t just a tech upgrade. It’s a shift in how we interact with information. No links. No scrolling. Just useful answers, tailored to you.

programme.title: Creature Called A Chameleon
programme.desc: A group of characters are discussing a plan to capture two individuals in Oasis. The big bosses have ordered their capture, and they are offering money and assistance. The plan involves a mysterious creature called a chameleon. One character is sent to gather more information while others monitor hidden cameras. Later, it is revealed that the capture plan failed and Bee and Bow were able to use their electric powers to escape.

programme.title: Wheels And Two Invisible Kidnappers
programme.desc: Grady has disappeared and his friends find tracks of his wheels and two invisible kidnappers. They call Dr. Pedal and decide to let Bee and Bow handle the situation before taking action.

programme.title: Hiding in the Dark
programme.desc: Can the wise and vigilant Q-Star League outsmart the cunning tactics of the Buster Gang and protect their valuable Tornado Accelerators? Despite their challenges, the Q-Star League remains steadfast in its mission to safeguard its assets and uphold justice. With determination and perseverance, they will overcome any obstacle and emerge victorious.

programme.title: The Eating Competition
programme.desc: Amidst a daunting challenge, Flame and Thunder are determined to retrieve the Food Maker from Cyclones grasp. The villain has transformed harmless foods into menacing weapons, including pickled fish pizza, lard pudding, and big crunchy french fries. Our heroes must rely on their intellect and abilities to prevail in this endeavor. Let us wholeheartedly root for them as they embark on this courageous mission!

programme.title: THE DUCK HUNTER
programme.desc: Its 1942. In the countryside of Modena, in northern Italy, the story of four friends is intertwined, each with their dream to realize. The story is set at the time of the second world war, and the tragic events of this period will end by sweeping away everyone and everything. Only one of them will realize his dream.

programme.title: EXHIBIT X
programme.desc: A party held in one of the most haunted houses in the country as a publicity stunt to launch a new liquor company ended with 51 people dead. The police arrived on the scene to find the house on fire. They managed to rescue one person from the blaze, a beautiful model from New York who is not the prime suspect in the murder trial. A camera containing footage from that night was also found in the house and delivered to investigators. This is the restricted footage leaked by a jury member in one of the most infamous murder trials in US history and the first of its kind of include paranormal evidence.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 57
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 13

The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. programme.title: NO BANANAS!!
programme.desc: Chai Raja in all gusto, pulls open his pantry and finds that he is out of bananas- now how will he make fries?! Oops! Quickly putting Sundar in charge, Chai Raja hops on his rusty cycle and heads off for fresh stock. Meanwhile, Sundar sees the customers line up and for the sake of Chai Raja wants to somehow keep them happy. Sundar sees Basha snacking on his private banana reserve and sprinting over strikes a deal with Basha- give me your bananas for now, and I will let you snack. Basha, after a moments thought agrees and the deal is struck. As Basha in an odd moment of generosity, entertains the customers, Sundar frantically hashes up fritters- but when Basha shows up for his share, Sundarsidelines him and serves the customers. When this happens more than twice, Basha loses his nice-guy face and decides to set things straight. The customers find their plates vanishing and their teas arriving in curious ways. Sundar tries to iron things out, but Basha is in a frenzy. Soon when Chai Raja arrives triumphantly hoisting fresh bananas, he is literally stampeded by the fleeing customers. Sundar stands sheepish as not far away Basha chuckles holding a pile of banana fritters. He bites into one and chews...but then in disgust spits it out; after all Sundar cant cook like Chai Raja. Shrugging, Basha digs out his special reserve banana and chews on it philosophically.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: CRUNCHY SHAADI
programme.desc: A newly married couple straight from the mandap is passing by Hotel Kelifornia when the bride still in the wedding dress (with ghoonghat) smells the yummy fried murukku and the piping hot tea. She wants to try and her young and chivalrous husband would give his beautiful wife anything she wants. The couple comes in and the husband is all grandiose personified to impress his wife. Sundar is all ready to please them. And our little Basha finds this the right opportunity to grab the crispy murukkus. He makes sure that none of the food which Sundar carries, goes to the couple. And Basha comes up with crazy ways including disguising as the groom (with sehera) to grab and eat the food from the brides plate before she could even smell them. The bride is angered by the groom who is incapable of feeding her. The poor groom is trying everything possible to win the heart of his young wife. It is madness inside the hotel and Sundar is going nuts. At last the bride is fed up. She whacks the hell out of the useless groom. Basha now changes his plan and does things in such a way that the groom thinks that Sundar has been messing with him. The groom is furious and exposes Sundar to his bride and then throws him away. Then the chivalrous groom takes a huge plate full of snacks and offers it to his wife. Awww it is love all over again!! And the couple walk away in full on romance. With a crying Sundar looking at them. Basha is chewing the fag end of the yummy kacha-kela-bhajiya!

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Smightycorns
programme.desc: Melody and the magical Smightycorns perform at a festival, while the Villains try to ruin the day by disguising themselves as one. When Sneevil and Biggs get their hands on the Air Stone, a winding chase ensues through the Magic Region.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Tommys Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Pirates Ahoy!
programme.desc: Nardy is afraid to swim and Dude tries to teach him, but Nardy just doesnt seem to get it. It all comes together though when the Villains dressed as pirates steal the Water Stone. Nardy has to dive in and face his fears to save the day.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: BASHA vs BILLA
programme.desc: Basha is in great spirits as he once again runs circles around Sundar and gets his daily exercise leading the other in a one-sided chase when suddenly his naughtiness takes a nosedive as he finds himself face to face with his biggest rival Billa a monkey who is naughtier, meaner and more menacing. The moment Sundar finds out that Billa also has a fascination for banana fritters, he bribes the new monkey to his side. Now for the first time, Basha has to face a foe who is his match, or perhaps a tough match. Lets see how this all ends!

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: The twins clean a wasteland to make it a nicer playground to play in.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: Paper Plate
programme.desc: Simple yet the possibilities are endless, Hepi and Briko surprise us with their ideas

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Be Cruel to Your School
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: The jealous panda
programme.desc: The twins are in a forest where they encounter the friendly panda Han who is happily playing with a wooden board. But another panda steals it to make a bridge between two rocks. For Yo Yo it will not be easy to get out of that situation.

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: Coin
programme.desc: What to do with all that spare change? Hepi and Briko have an idea for you

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: Girlfriends Are A Girl’s Best Friend
programme.desc: Fred pushes Brains to try to get more girlfriends, and fit in more at school. Since other girls are all reading the “Ghostlight” books, Brains tries it, and gets hooked. Fred doesn’t get the books girly appeal, and worries that he’s going to lose Brains to her new girly romance-loving crowd.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: The Great Manfredi – The Bremen Town Musicians
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the famous tale by the Brothers Grimm, “THE BREMEN TOWN MUSICIANS“, having been called out by the MANAGER of that city’s theatre. Finally, the four musical animals are about to achieve their great dream: to perform in the Bremen Grand Theatre. But a mysterious, dangerous ghost seems to want to prevent this. The fairytale detective and her elf assistant unravel the mystery and confront the Great Manfredi, a cunning magician and illusionist.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: It's OK To Make Mistakes
programme.desc: Dada and Bubbles make a delicious dish together. Soon, Duda shows up and wants to decorate it with ketchup, but ends up pouring it all over Bubble. Meanwhile, Caber is busy organizing his books at home. Duda comes and offers to help, but only causes more mess. Later, Duda sees an apple and tries to pick it for Bubble; Unfortunately, he loses his balance and falls into a paint that splatters all over Pinkar. Poor Duda is having a very bad day. With the help of Scots Time Machine, Duda decides to travel back in time and fix his "mistakes." Will Duda be able to undo his mistakes? Or will he discover something quite surprising?

programme.title: Assaf The Magician – Aladdin
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of “Aladdin and the Magic Lamp”. The Sultan, the PRINCESS’s father, requires their detective services, as the evil magician ASSAF has returned and has stolen ALADDIN’s lamp. Not content with this, the perfidious magician has ordered the GENIE kill ALADDIN and then take his palace, with the PRINCESS inside, and transport it to his lair, in the distant Atlas Mountains. SANDRA will face the most powerful magician in the Thousand and One Nights with her only weapon: her ingenuity.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Genie Ball
programme.desc: Genie, Aladdin and Jamillah are playing an enchanted version of football - Genie Football! The Princess can hear all the fun from inside the palace and wishes she could join in but the Grand Vizier wont let her out. She sneaks out disguised as a washer woman and is quickly hit by the enchanted football. As soon as she touches it she falls into a deep slumber. Thats what happens when Princesses mess with Genie magic. Now they need to find a prince to kiss her and wake her up before the guards find her with our gang and arrest them for kidnapping. But Jamillah remembers that Aladdin will one day become a prince and convinces him to do it. Reluctantly he does and the princess wakes just before the palace guards burst in.

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: School For Princesses – Snow White Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, to the home of the seven DWARVES, having been called out by one of these, GRUMPY. When the DWARVES returned from work, they found that SNOW WHITE was not there and there was an opened letter lying on the table. The letter invites SNOW WHITE to enrol at a prestigious school for princesses. SANDRA soon discovers that the letter is the work of the STEPMOTHER and she and FO go to the boarding school, where all the PRINCESSES in the land of fairytales are now living. The STEPMOTHER, who is the headmistress of the school, is jealous of their beauty and has terrible plans for all of them. With their usual ingenuity and a great deal of humour, however, SANDRA and FO will prevent her from putting them into action.

programme.title: Detective Duda
programme.desc: Scot receives a special pair of underwear at his home. He puts it on and goes to sleep, excited to show it to his friends the next day. But when he wakes up, he discovers that he had a small accident. Afraid that his friends would make fun of him, he goes to dry his underwear, but the wind blows it away to Pinkar. Meanwhile, Dadas watch has disappeared. Duda plays detective and tries to solve the mystery. However, when the friends catch Scot on top of Pinkar, they jump to conclusions and accuse him of taking the watch. Scot, embarrassed to tell them the truth, runs away. Its up to Duda to get to the bottom of things. Will Detective Duda solve the case and save the day?

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene 36, está sin trabajo y soltera, así que ha decidido tomar las riendas de su destino.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene un plan para conquistar el corazón de Max, el hombre de sus sueños al que todavía no conoce.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie debe elegir entre una historia de amor real y una historia de un hipotético amor ideal.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Max y Julie pasaron la noche juntos y fue maravilloso, pero después se encuentran a la mujer que él ama.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Stéphane se ve despampanante en la foto del calendario del club de rugby. Ava intenta recuperar a sus hijos.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Rad Fael
programme.desc: Director: Hossam El Gohary - Cast:Mahmoud Abdel El Mogne -Houria Farghali / - Year of production: 2012

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Soul Detective

Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Training Pigeons 1936

programme.title: Bride and Gloom

programme.title: Betty Boop and the Little King 1936

programme.title: to duck or not to duck

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: The Friendly Ghost
programme.desc: Unhappy with the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After scaring several others by accident, Casper befriends two young children

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Play Safe -1936
programme.desc: A little boy jumps on a real train and learns a lesson about safety.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill 1930
programme.desc: Sailor Bimbo (as Barnacle Bill) jumps ship with his little black book and visits his lady friend, Betty Boop (with dog's ears).

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: Midnight Manhunt-1945
programme.desc: In a cheap hotel room in New York City Jelke shoots gangster Joe Wells, takes a package from his pocket and flees.Wells staggers into an alley. On her way to her apartment above a wax museum, Sue Gallagher, a reporter for the Chronicle, finds Wells' body and hides his corpse among the wax-figures in the museum and calls her paper to send a photographer so she can get a scoop on the killing of Wells, who had a $5,000 reward for his capture, dead or alive. Meanwhile, Henry Miggs, the museum owner find the body and is ready to call the police but his handyman, Clutch Tracy tells him to conceal it and avoid suspicion. From this point on it is a game of where-is-the-body....and the stolen South American diamonds Wells was carrying.

programme.title: Charlie Chaplin's: The Good for Nothing 1914
programme.desc: Charlie meets a couple and agrees to care for the man's crippled uncle. After the couple breaks up, the man's new girl drops some eggs, which Charlie slips on while trying to control the wheelchair. Charlie sets up the uncle near another wheelchair on a jetty, from which he lifts a beggar's cup and "invalid" sign; he places these with the uncle and money starts to roll in. Charlie takes the money and buys himself a drink. Returning, he gets to know the abandoned young woman. After pushing the uncle and his chair into the drink and battling the beggar and two policemen, one of whom arrests the uncle, Charlie beats up his rival and gets the girl

programme.title: Back Stage-1923
programme.desc: The gang operates a donkey-propelled tour bus. Later, a cut-rate vaudeville producer hires them to help out with his show, which they wreck.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 19;Class Reunion
programme.desc: At his high school class reunion, Andy finds that, while memories may fade over time, some connections are never completely broken, and some hearts never completely heal

programme.title: Cops 1922
programme.desc: A series of mishaps manages to make a young man get chased by a big city's entire police force

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962: Season 2; Episode 5; Hustling the Hustler
programme.desc: Rob doesn't know what he's in for when he invites Buddy's charming, pool hustling brother Blackie over for dinner and a friendly game of billiards.

programme.title: Mabel, Fatty and the Law
programme.desc: In a small city park where strict vigilance is maintained against flirting. Mabel, a young and pretty wife with a bore of a husband innocently amuses herself with the harmless attentions of Fatty. Fatty relishes the situation all the more because this is one of those rare occasions, when he has succeeded in escaping from the jailer-like watchfulness of his wife. Meanwhile, Fatty's wife and Mabel's husband are carrying on a similar game. They are discovered by the police and a sensational arrest ensues. Both couples appear in court, where numerous complications make a reel full of fun.

programme.title: The Lucy Show 1966: Season 5; Episode 8; Lucy and Carol in Palm Springs
programme.desc: Lucy calls in sick so she can join her roommate at a Palm Springs resort. Unfortunately, her boss, Mr. Mooney, is staying at the same hotel.

programme.title: The Fatal Glass of Beer 1933
programme.desc: The prodigal son of a Yukon prospector comes home on a night that "ain't fit for man nor beast."

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!

programme.desc: Daniel Boone leads settlers into Kentucky, but must battle Shawnee Indians who have been persuaded by a French renegade that Boone and the settlers are there to kill them and steal their land.

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians 1964
programme.desc: In Santa Claus Conquers the Martians, holiday cheer goes interplanetary when Martians, desperate to bring joy to their children, kidnap Santa and whisk him away to the Red Planet. With the help of two Earth kids and his boundless Christmas spirit, Santa turns the tables on his captors and spreads laughter across the galaxy. Campy, colorful, and brimming with 1960s sci-fi charm, this cult favorite delivers a cosmic dose of yuletide fun.

programme.title: A Christmas Without Snow 1980
programme.desc: In A Christmas Without Snow, Michael Learned stars as a recently divorced woman who moves to San Francisco to rebuild her life. Joining the choir of a struggling church, she finds friendship, strength, and a new sense of purpose under the guidance of the stern but inspiring choirmaster (John Houseman). As the group prepares for a performance of Handel’s Messiah, their shared struggles and triumphs bring them closer together, revealing the true meaning of hope and community during the holiday season. Heartfelt and uplifting, this made-for-TV classic shines with warmth and faith.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Christmas Show 1961
programme.desc: In The Jack Benny Christmas Show, holiday cheer meets classic comedy as Jack Benny brings his trademark wit to a festive television special. Joined by his regular cast and surprise guests, Benny’s dry humor and perfectly timed gags light up the season with laughter. Blending sketches, music, and holiday spirit, this variety show captures the warmth and fun of Christmas in true Jack Benny style.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol 1951
programme.desc: In A Christmas Carol, Alastair Sim delivers a definitive performance as Ebenezer Scrooge, the miser whose icy heart is thawed by a haunting Christmas Eve journey. Visited by the ghost of Jacob Marley and the three Spirits of Christmas, Scrooge is forced to confront his past, witness the struggles of the present, and glimpse the bleak future awaiting him if he does not change. With atmospheric direction, powerful performances, and a timeless message of redemption, this beloved adaptation brings Charles Dickens’ classic tale to life in unforgettable fashion.

programme.title: Eagle in a Cage
programme.desc: In 1815, a soldier becomes the Governor of St. Helena, and jailer of Napoleon.

programme.title: Alias John Law
programme.desc: John Clark and his deaf pal, Bootch Collum (Buck Connors), are trailed by U. S. Marshal Lamar Bly , who thinks they are part of The Kootney Kid's (Earl Dwire) gang, which had just held up the stage coach. But the gang attacks the pair, and Bly joins them in the gunfight.

programme.title: Corregidor
programme.desc: A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

programme.title: The Desperate Mission 1969
programme.desc: In The Desperate Mission, Ricardo Montalbán stars as the legendary Joaquin Murrieta, the Mexican folk hero branded an outlaw by those who stole his land and destroyed his family. With a price on his head, he leads a daring fight against corruption, injustice, and betrayal across the California frontier. Filled with adventure, romance, and rebellion, this made-for-TV Western brings the legend of Murrieta to life with passion and fire.

programme.title: Hit the Saddle

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Dayan from Duyos Humidors introduces the first Cuban-made cigar accessories legally imported into the U.S. in 65 years, highlighting their handcrafted humidors made from 100% cedar and other fine woods. He shares his personal connection to cigars through his grandfather's farm in Cuba and discusses the company's future plans, including customization options and collaborations.

programme.title: Privada Masterclass
programme.desc: In this episode of our cigar masterclass, we‚Äôre stepping into the world of tobacco curing‚Äîa process as much about tradition as it is about technique. It all starts in the curing barns, where the air is thick with the smell of drying leaves and the quiet rhythm of nature at work.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast Jared to review the Henry Clay Warhawk cigar. Join them as they examine its robust flavors, smooth burn, and overall experience, sharing their thoughts on how this bold cigar compares to others in its class.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: This week on Burn Rate, tobacco aficionados Brian and Chris delve into the diverse and often debated world of Gurkha cigars. They'll explore a specific Gurkha offering, dissecting its blend, construction, and flavor profile.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean lights up a conversation with Law Ream, the insightful palate behind the Republic of Debauchery cigar review channel. Beyond his celebrated reviews, Law shares his journey into the world of cigar criticism, his unique methodology for dissecting a blend, and what he believes truly makes a cigar worthy of his praise.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join Sean Mobley and Kyle Lenz as they tour King Corona Cigars, Bar and Coffee in Ybor City, Florida.. Check out the latest in cigars and learn what sets the lounge apart from the rest.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: In this episode of the Creekside Podcast, Dave introduces his "top five summer smokes," featuring the HVC Cero - Sobresita, Warped GR88 Gran Reserva 1988, Tatouage Cajonu 2003, Matilde Serene, and Avowed Cigars' New Dawn, highlighting their unique flavor profiles and ideal smoking times for the summer. Later, the hosts tackle listener questions, debating the closest non-Cuban cigars to Cuban profiles (including Atabay, Serino Ta√≠no, Rodriguez Reserva Privada, Warped Don Rinaldo, El Septimo, and Caldwell Eastern Standard) , and sharing their "worst cigar" experiences, like the Mark Twain Memoir and a Plasencia Reserva Original. They also address the "unpopular opinion" that Liga Privada cigars are overrated, agreeing with the sentiment and criticizing the brand's retail sales practices.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: This episode of Creekside Cigar Co unveils the June Cigar Club box, celebrates reaching almost 200 members, and features a discussion about new cigar samples and brands.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast John to review the Jamie Garcia Reserva Special cigar. Together, they discuss its rich, full-bodied flavors, perfect burn, and overall experience, offering their takes on what makes this cigar a must-try for connoisseurs.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ELIAS DOSUNMU - EL CHEF UCRANIANO MÁS VIRAL
programme.desc:
En este súper episodio conocemos un poco más acerca de Elias Dosunmu, inmigrante ucraniano y chef del momento. Con más de 15 millones en sus redes sociales nos cuenta cómo fueron sus comienzos y cómo se prepara para la próxima apertura de su propio restaurante en Madrid: PECADOS.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MERAKIO - EL QUE SE RÍE PIERDE
programme.desc:
En este episodio vino el creador de contenido Merakio a contarnos cómo es vivir de las redes sociales, qué es lo que más le preocupa y qué planes tiene para su futuro. Capítulo con muchas risas aseguradas. No olvides suscribirte!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: LUANA FIGUEREDO - LA FIGURA EMERGENTE DE LA ESCENA ARGENTINA
programme.desc:
Conocimos a la artista argentina Luana Figueredo, conversamos sobre su carrera, su futuro y además nos deleitó con su voz. Estamos seguros de que su talento la llevará a cruzar todas las fronteras.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: JAVIER BRICHETTO - EL REY DE LA CARNE ARGENTINA EN ESPAÑA
programme.desc:
Qué divertido e interesante hablar con Javier Brichetto, embajador de la Marca Pais Argentina en España y dueño de los restaurantes Piantao. Conocido por su excelencia gastronómica, hoy exploramos un poco más acerca de su carrera y su futuro.

programme.title: Ed Young Ministries
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wokeism, a neo-Paganistic, neo-Marxist system, is vying for our families across this great nation. Every day, we must fight for the health and safety of our kids. But how do we slay this beast that, at times, seems so innocent while it devours the country's moral fabric? In this talk, Pastors Ed and Lisa Young prepare us for battle, giving us practical handles on building our kids' lives on a biblical, Christ-centered worldview. We’ll discover that when we confront the Wolf of Wokeism with God’s truth, it wilts before our eyes. From victory, we praise our loving Good Shepherd, who will lead us to the greatness of God’s will.

programme.title: Guest Eternal Polk
programme.desc: When your family is facing a crisis, sometimes it's hard to think past your own situation. Heirs' property issues and the potential loss of family land is like that. I feels like "just a me problem". Land loss is very personal; especially when it's your family's heritage. Unfortunately, heirs' property is far too common and the toll that it is taking on Black family structures is in a word, devastating. By now, you might have seen or heard about the documentary, Silver Dollar Road. If you haven't, watch it. In this episode, here's the personal and painful side of the heirs' property story, from one of the family members who's family has been dealing with for years.
